document_data.name: Zorkh
document_data.mainbody: '''Zorkh''' was a [[stone giant]] hermit sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Description: Zorkh was mute; he could understand the [[Giant language]] but could not speak.
document_data.Activities: Zorkh lived as hermit in the [[Greypeak Mountains]]. He was always followed by six [[goat]]s. He reacted friendlily to people.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], the stone giants of Thane [[Kayalithica]] destroyed every building of the village [[Orlbar]]. Afterward, Zorkh decided to collect all the stones of the destroyed buildings, stacking them in creative ways, thus obtaining a "forest" of piled-up stones.
